## hpr0438 :: Podcasts I Listen To

 Dave Yates from the "Lotta Linux Links Linux User Podcast" does a show about all the podcasts he listens to.  And, as you'd expect, he provides a LOT of linux links here in the shownotes.
Dave's List of RSS Feeds: 
https://www.linuxuserpodcast.com/feed/podcast/?format=ogg
https://feeds.feedburner.com/cmdln_free
https://feeds2.feedburner.com/SomethingKindaTechy
https://talkgeektome.us/ogg.xml
https://trygnulinux.com/ogg.rss
https://www.tuxradar.com/files/podcast/podcast_ogg.rss
https://linuxgeekdom.com/rssogg.xml
https://linuxvoid.technographer.net/soundfeed.xml
https://www.softwarefreedom.org/feeds/podcast-ogg/
https://feeds.feedburner.com/TenBuckReview
https://www.fossgeek.com/feeds/rss-ogg-full.xml
https://ubuntupodcast.net/?feed=rss2
https://setbit.org/lt-ogg.xml
https://jwplinux.libsyn.com/rss
https://linuxcranks.info/ogg.xml
https://feeds.feedburner.com/thetechiegeek/ogg
https://www.thebadapples.info/fedorareloaded/ogg.xml
https://feeds.feedburner.com/UbuntuUkPodcastOgg-high
https://www.thebadapples.info/ogg.xml
https://linuxcrazy.com/podcasts/ogg.xml
https://thelinuxlink.net/files/lager_ogg.rss
https://www.hwhq.com/rssOGG.xml
https://www.linuxbasement.com/ogg/feed
https://feeds.feedburner.com/feedburner/knightcast
https://feeds.feedburner.com/doctorow_podcast
https://lottalinuxlinks.com/podcast/uclugogg.xml
https://www.tmbg.com/_media/_pod/podcast.xml
https://feeds.feedburner.com/GNSciTech
https://goinglinux.com/mp3podcast.xml
https://feeds.feedburner.com/sourcetrunk
https://www.thelinuxlink.net/tllts/tllts_ogg.rss
https://hackervoice.co.uk/feed.xml
https://distrowatch.com/news/podcast.xml
https://pauldotcom.com/podcast/psw.xml
https://feeds.feedburner.com/freshubuntuogg
https://feeds.feedburner.com/linuxoutlaws
https://distrocast.org/?feed=podcast&format=mp3 
A Lotta Linux Links: 
https://lincgeek.org/bashpodder
https://linuxplanet.org/casts
https://linuxplanet.org/casts/?feed=rss2
https://thelinuxlink.net
